ConceptDef.label: Survival Tools: Equipping tools
ConceptDef.helpText:
In order for colonists to be able to perform certain tasks (e.g. felling trees) efficiently, they need to have the appropriate tools (e.g. axes for felling trees).

Select a colonist, right-click a tool you want them to use, then either have them equip it in their main hand or put it in their inventory.

Colonists can only carry up to 3 tools at once in their inventory, so keep that in mind!
